abstract: Berkshire Hathaway has made a formal offer to buy the roughly 1.4 million shares it doesn’t already own of subsidiary Wesco Financial, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway has made a formal offer to buy the roughly 1.4 million shares it doesn’t already own of subsidiary Wesco Financial, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway has made a formal offer to buy the roughly 1.4 million shares it doesn’t already own of its subsidiary Wesco Financial, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Berkshire Makes Formal Bid for Wesco Subsidiary
